ssot__SurveyResponse__dlm.name: Survey Response
ssot__SurveyResponse__dlm.description: The Survey Response DMO represents an answer to a survey question.

ssot__CompletionDateTime__c.description: The date and time the survey response was completed.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the survey response.

ssot__Last ModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the survey response.

ssot__SubmitterId__c.description: A reference ID to the submitter of the response.

ssot__SubmitterObject__c.description: The submitter object for the response.

ssot__SurveyInvitationId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey invitation for the response.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey response DMO.

ssot__SurveyResponseStatus__c.description: The status of the survey response.

ssot__SurveyVersionId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey version of the response.
